data.text: @TompkinsHealth Will you ever release the info regarding vax injuries in Tompkins county? Or does the public not deserve that information?
@William85930562 @TompkinsHealth They’re still using last weeks data for Tompkins. Once they update it we’ll be out of the high.

@TompkinsHealth Do any smart #twithaca people understand why Tompkins is still under “high” categorization? According to CDC data we meet all the thresholds for medium. @TompkinsHealth can you look into this? https://t.co/ctzaSp9kQ8

Tompkins County is making high-quality KN95 masks & COVID-19 Self-Test Kits freely available to the community. For more info, go to: https://t.co/835TR93QDS or call @211Tomp_Cort.

Everyone eligible is encouraged to stay up to date on vaccinations & get tested if sick. 
(3/3) https://t.co/qY0nIOQYuw

Masks continue to be a highly effective tool in stopping the spread of COVID-19. Under the local mask advisory, TCHD continues to urge mask wearing for all individuals while indoors and around others, as well as other precautions to stop the spread of COVID-19. 
(2/3) https://t.co/LxfQg21hgS
